casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Mario Andrette McNEILL. No. 446A13-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 27, 2015. Benjamin Dowling-Sendor, Assistant Appellate Defender, Andrew DeSimone, Assistant Appellate Defender, for McNeill, Mario Andrette. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. William West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. William R. West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of August 2015 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of August 2015."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 28th day of September 2015 to serve his/her proposed record upon the district attorney. The parties shall then proceed to settle and file the record on appeal pursuant to the provisions of Appellate Rules 11 and 12.
